comment._content: One can just imagine this deck thronged with passengers.................being nuisances, messing up the planking, making work for honest sailors!

comment.author: 29295370@N07
comment._content: I second that, seems strange seeing it empty, but like you said - can imagine it heaving with passengers looking out to sea.

comment.realname: Thank you for visiting my page.

comment._content: a time gone by,,,I can picture the deck crew scrubbing these decks at 2 in the morning so as to not disturb the passengers,
